name: Outro
_source: speak;;You completed the map in 25 or less turns! You got the full reward!;;;hint
speak;;Unfortunately, you completed the map in more than 20 turns, so your reward will be reduced accordingly.;;;hint
speak;Tewi;Ow! Ow! Easy on the ears, buddy!
speak;Marisa;We got lucky this time! Talk aboutta change in fortune!
speak;Reimu;Not until you tell us where we can find the doctor. We are due for an appointment.
speak;Reimu;Or you'll be known as the "Rabbit of Misfortune" once I'm done with you.
speak;Tewi;Hey now, Gensokyo already has enough people in the misfortune trade...{c:wait;400} I'm looking at one of them right now.
speak;Reimu;Oh that does it! Marisa.{c:wait;200} Rabbit.{c:wait;200} Now.
speak;Marisa;Sure thing boss. One rabbit stew comin' righ-
speak;Marisa;Ow-geez! Who even puts a hole in a throne room? I blame poor level design...
speak;Tewi;Wow, your friend must have took that fall hard! Anyways, the night isn't so young anymore, so bye~.
speak;Reimu;...{c:wait;200}There won't be enough left to cross the Sanzu.
speak;Kasen;Tricky that rabbit is, I wonder what she is planning?
speak;Reimu;Whatever. Let's just get this thing over with and eat out after.{c:wait;400} Rabbit does sound good actually.
speak;Kasen;We should perchance fish out the magician in the hole before we begin with dinner plans.
speak;Reimu;Alright fine...{c:wait;300} let's get the rope.
speak;Kasen;An act of kindness...{c:wait;300} doesn't that feel good?
speak;Reimu;Do I look like Kandata to you?
speak;Kasen;You're not the one in the pit at least.
